name: Jump Soul
storyline: A nameless soul has lost their heart and must jump their way to the top to retrieve it. It will be a true test of control and patience. A long, but beautiful journey awaits... and those who can reach the top will be rewarded greatly.
summary: It's like if Jump King and Limbo had a baby. A platform jumper for Android (offered in Google Play) that invokes consistent feelings of total relaxation and complete frustration. Most games reward you as you go... this game punishes you if you mess up. Beautiful atmospherics, unique design, tons of puzzling obstacles, and an amazing soundtrack of piano work by Myuu. This is a solid work of art for any casual mobile gamer.
